citation.case_name: Merck Kgaa v. Integra Lifesciences I, Ltd.

html:
543 U.S. 805

MERCK KGAA
v.
INTEGRA LIFESCIENCES I, LTD., ET AL.

No. 03-1237.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 4, 2004.

1

C.A. Fed. Cir. The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States. JUSTICE O'CONNOR and JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
